title: Bromwich Offered at 35 percent Discount
content:
We’re currently offering The [Bromwich Family](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014141700/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/bromwich/) (and the [Bromwich Value Pack](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014141700/http:/new.myfonts.com/package/325852/), including the associated Great Bromwich family) at a 35% discount on [Myfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014141700/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/bromwich/). Bromwich was one of our earliest families and is something of a favourite with us and others. It remains a solidly popular face and is also somethingof a signature family for us, being the basis our our Foundry logos.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014141700im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bd_6308.png)
author: Rasendyll
